title: How to create a WiFi hotspot in Windows 7 - Quora

response.answer_text: There are two hardware prerequisites: You must have a wired Ethernet connection to the internet, and your computer must have a Wi-Fi LAN adapter. (A USB Wi-Fi adapter does not cost much if your computer does not already have a Wi-Fi adapter built in. I would recommend that you get the sort which sports a reasonably sized antenna.) Several other answers point you to the software setup steps.
